name: Lofi's Journey
description:
Lofi's Journey

Inspired by a conversation with my friend Lofi, in 2019.
A little platformer about a pingvin called Lofi, who is trying to get back home.
Note: You cannot jump on the enemies.

My Journey 
When asked, when did I start using Godot?
I originally would guess it was sometime in the later half of 2018, after watching a HeartBeast video on Youtube.
Now after looking at a chatlog, it seems that I may have guessed one year too early.

Events later lead me to drop Godot and delete all my files.
Then in late August 2021, I found my way back to Godot.
Thanks to Benjamin and Juan, though they are not aware of it.

At that time, in my cloud storage, I also found the zip file with my first Godot game. It will soon be a year since I got back to using Godot, and so I have convinced myself to finally share it publicly, please enjoy.
